long: Meaning: "Kirjath-Jearim" or "Kirjath-Arim", a place in Palestine.  Usage: Kirjath, Kirjath-jearim, Kirjath-arim.  Source: or (Jeremiah 26:20) with the article interposed; or (Joshua 18:28) simply the former part of the word; or "קִרְיַת עָרִים"; from "H7151" and the plural of "H3293" or "H5892"; city of forests, or city of towns;
